channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned suitcase full off rubbish, 30th January
item.description:

item.title: Lots of litter along Shortlands Road, 30th January

item.title: Taking up parking space for residents, 30th January
item.description:
This van was put outside number 16 parsonage lane at Christmas time, it is taking up parking space for residents and it is a total eyesore. Can this please be removed, i will also contact the local councillor regarding this issue. As people have now started dumping stuff near this vehicle.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parsonage Lane, North Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This whole street has so much litter along it, 30th January
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned broken brown recycling bin, 30th January
item.description:
A abandoned broken brown recycling bin has been left in the rear access alley at the rear of the properties in Lion road, the access is in Freta road. It hasn't got its lid so I imagine this is why it has been dumped, it also doesn't have a door number / address on it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Freta Road, Bexley, Greater London
